247:1: nātmaduḥkhena tathā santaḥ saṃtapyante yathāpakāriṇāṃ kuśalapakṣahānyā|
247:3: bodhisattvaḥ kila śrīmati himavatpārśve vividhadhāturuciracitrāṅgarāge nīlakauśeyaprāvārakṛtottarāsaṅga iva vanagahanalakṣmyā prayatnaracitairivānekavarṇasaṃsthānavikalpairvaiṣamyabhakticitrairvibhūṣitataṭāntadeśe pravisṛtanaikaprasravaṇajale gambhīrakandarāntaraprapātasaṃkule paṭutaramadhukaranināde manojñamārutopavījyamānavicitrapuṣpaphalapādape vidyādharākrīḍabhute mahākāyaḥ kapirekacaro babhuva|
247:4: tadavasthamapi cainamapariluptadharmasaṃjñaṃ kṛtajñamakṣudrasvabhāvaṃ dhṛtyā mahatyā samanvitamanurāgavaśādiva karuṇā naiva mumoca|
247:5: sakānanā sādrivarā sasāgarā gatā vināśaṃ śataśo vasuṃdharā|
247:7: atha sa mahātmā tāpasa iva vanaruparṇaphalamātravṛttiranukampamānastena tena vidhinā gocarapatitān prāṇinastamaraṇyapradeśamadhyavasati sma|
247:8: athānyatamaḥ puruṣo gāṃ pranaṣṭāmanveṣituṃ kṛtodyogaḥ samantato'nuvicaran mārgāpranaṣṭo digbhāgasaṃmūḍhamatiḥ paribhramaṃstaṃ deśamupajagāma|
247:9: sa kṣutpipāsādharmaśramaparimlānatanurdaurmanasyavahninā cāntaḥpradīpyamāno viṣādātibhārādivānyatamasmin vṛkṣamūle niṣaṇṇo dadarśa paripākavaśādvicyutāni paripiñjarāṇi katicittindukīphalāni|
247:10: sa tānyāsvādya kṣutparikṣāmatayā paramasvādūni manyamānastatprabhavānveṣaṇaṃ pratyabhivṛddhotsāhaḥ samantato'nuvilokayan dadarśa prapātataṭāntavirūḍhaṃ paripakkaphalānamitapiñjarāgraśākhaṃ tindukīvṛkṣam|
247:11: sa tatphalatṛṣṇayākṛṣyamāṇastaṃ giritaṭamadhiruhya tasya tindukīvṛkṣasya phaliniṃ śākhāṃ prapātābhinatāmadhyāruroha phalalobhena cāsyāḥ prāntamupajagāma|
247:12: śākhātha sā tasya mahīruhasya bhārātiyogānnamitā kṛśatvāt|
247:14: sa tayā sārdhaṃ mahati giridurge samantataḥ śailabhittiparikṣipte kūpa iva nyapatat|
247:16: sa tasmāduttīrya salilātsamantataḥ parisarpanna kutaściduttaraṇamārgaṃ dadarśa|
247:17: sa nispratīkāraṃ martavyamiha mayā nacirāditi visrasyamānajīvitāśaḥ śokāśrupariṣiktadīnavadanastrīvreṇa daurmanasyaśalyena pratudyamānaḥ kātarahṛdayastattadārtivaśād vilalāp|
247:19: yatnādapi parimṛgayan mṛtyoranyaḥ ka iva paśyet||3||
247:26: iti sa puruṣastattadvilapaṃstena salilena taiśca sahanipatitaistindukaphalairvartayamānaḥ katiciddināni tatrāvasat|
247:27: atha sa mahākapirāhārahetostadvanamanuvicarannāhūyamān iva mārutākampitābhistasya tindukīvṛkṣasyāgraśākhābhistaṃ pradeśamabhijagāma|
247:28: abhiruhya cainaṃ tatprapātamavalokayan dadarśa taṃ puruṣaṃ kṣutparikṣāmanayanavadanaṃ paripāṇḍukṛśadīnagātraṃ paryutsukaṃ tatra viceṣṭamānam|
247:29: sa tasya paridyūnatayā samāvajitānukampo mahākapirnikṣiptāhāravyāpārastaṃ puruṣaṃ pratataṃ bikṣamāṇo mānuṣīṃ vācamuvāca-
247:31: vaktumahaṃsi tatsādhu ko bhavāhina vā kutaḥ||6||
247:32: atha sa puruṣastaṃ mahākapimārtatayā samabhipraṇamyodvīkṣamāṇaḥ sāñjaliruvāca-
247:40: athainaṃ bodhisattvaḥ karuṇāyamāṇastatkāladurlabhena snigdhena vacasā samāśvāsayāmāsa-
247:42: yadvandhukṛtyaṃ tava kiṃcidatra kartāsmi tatsarvamalaṃ bhayena||10||
247:43: iti sa mahāsattvastaṃ puruṣamāśvāsya tataścāsmai tindukānyaparāṇi ca phalāni samupahṛtya taduddharaṇayogyayā puruṣabhāragurvyā śilayānyatra yogyāṃ cakāra|
247:44: tataścātmano balapramāṇamavagamya śakto'hamenametasmātprapātādurddhartumiti niścitamatiravatīrya prapātaṃ karuṇayā paricodyamānastaṃ puruṣamuvāca-
247:45: ehi pṛṣṭhaṃ mamāruhya sulagno'stu bhavān mayi|
247:47: asārasya śarīrasya sāro hyeṣa mataḥ satām|
247:50: athābhirūḍhaḥ sa nareṇa tena bharātiyogena vihanyamānaḥ|
247:54: atha bodhisattvaḥ śuddhasvabhāvatayā kṛtopakāratvācca tasmātpuruṣādapāyanirāśaṅko visrambhādenamuvāca-
247:56: khedaprasuptaṃ sahasā nihanti kaścitpurā māṃ svahitodayaṃ ca||15||
247:57: yato bhavān dikṣuṃ vikīrṇacakṣuḥ karotu rakṣāṃ mama cātmanaśca|
247:59: atha sa mithyāvinayapragalbhaḥ-svapitu bhavān yathākāmaṃ sukhaprabodhāya,
247:61: atha sa puruṣastasmin mahāsattve śramabalānnidrāvaśamupagate cintāmaśivāmāpede-
247:63: evaṃ parikṣīṇatanoḥ kathaṃ syādyātrāpi tāvatkuta eva puṣṭiḥ||17||
247:64: idaṃ ca kāntāramasupratāraṃ kathaṃ tariṣyāmi balena hīnaḥ|
247:65: paryāptarūpaṃ tvidamasya māṃsaṃ kāntāradurgottaraṇāya me syāt||18||
247:66: kṛtopakāro'pi ca bhakṣya eva nisargayogaḥ sa hi tādṛśo'sya|
247:69: imaṃ hi yuddhābhimukhaṃ sametya siṃho'pi saṃbhāvyaparājayaḥ syāt||20||
247:70: tannāyaṃ vilambituṃ me kāla iti viniścitya sa durātmā lobhadoṣavyāmohitamatirakṛtajño vipannadharmasaṃjñaḥ pranaṣṭakāruṇyasaumyasvabhāvaḥ paridurbalo'pyakāryātirāgānmahatīṃ śilāmudyamya tasya mahākapeḥ śirasi mumoca|
247:73: sarvātmanā sā na samāsasāda mūrdhānamasmānna vinispipeṣa|
247:74: koṭyekadeśena tu taṃ rujantī śīlā tale sāśanivatpapāta||22||
247:76: kenāhato'smīti dadarśa nānyaṃ tameva tu hrītamukhaṃ dadarśa||23||
247:79: atha sa mahākapirasyaiva tatkarmeti niscitamatiḥ svamabhighātaduḥkhamacintayitvā tena tasyātmahitanirapekṣeṇātikaṣṭena karmaṇā samupajātasaṃvegakāruṇyaḥ parityattakrodhasaṃrambhadoṣaḥ sabāspayanayanastaṃ puruṣamavekṣya samanuśocannuvāca-
247:81: kathaṃ nāma vyavasitaṃ prārabdhaṃ kathameva vā||25||
247:94: dunoti māṃ naiva tathā tviyaṃ rujā
247:102: ekākinaṃ kṣāmaśarīrakaṃ tvāṃ mārganabhijñaṃ hi vane bhramantam|
247:104: iti sa mahātmā taṃ puruṣamanuśocañjanāntamānīya pratipādya cainaṃ tanmārgaṃ punaruvāca-
247:109: iti sa mahākapistaṃ puruṣamanukampayā śiṣyamivānuśiṣya tameva vanapradeśaṃ pratijagāma|
247:110: atha sa puruṣastadatikasṭaṃ pāpaṃ kṛtvā paścāttāpavahninā saṃpradīpyamānacetāmahatā kuṣṭhavyādhinā rūpāntaramupanītaḥ kilāsacitracchaviḥ prabhidyamānavraṇavisravārdragātraḥ paramadurgandhaśarīraḥ sadyaḥ samapadyata|
247:111: sa yaṃ yaṃ deśamabhijagāma tatastata evainamatibībhatsavikṛtataradarśanaṃ mānuṣa ityaśraddheyarūpaṃ bhinnadīnasvaramabhivīkṣya puruṣāḥ sākṣadayaṃ pāṣmeti manyamānāḥ samudyataloṣṭadaṇḍā nirbhartsanaparuṣavacasaḥ pravāsayāmāsuḥ|
247:112: athainamanyatamo rājā mṛgayāmanuvicaran pretamivāraṇye paribhramantaṃ prakṣīṇamalinavasanaṃ nātipracchannakaupīnamatidurdaśanamabhivīkṣya sasādhvasakautūhalaḥ papraccha-
247:115: kastvaṃ pretaḥ piśāco vā mūrtaḥ pāṣmātha pūtanaḥ|
247:117: sa taṃ dīnena kaṇṭhena samabhipraṇamannuvāca-mānuso'smi mahārāja,
247:119: tatkathamimāmavasthāmanuprāpto'sīti ca paryanuyukto rājñā tadasmai svaṃ duścaritamāviṣkṛtyovāca-
247:132: imaṃ viditvā nṛpa mitrapakṣe prabhāvasiddhī sadasatpravṛttyoḥ|
247:133: bhajasva mārga sujanābhipannaṃ tena prayātamanuyāti bhūtiḥ||42||
247:134: tadevaṃ nātmaduḥkhena tathā santaḥ saṃtapyante yathāpakāriṇāṃ kuśalapakṣahānyā|
247:136: satkṛtya dharmaśravaṇe kṣāntikathāyāṃ mitrānabhidrohe pāpakarmādinavapradarśane ceti|
